original_text: So when Joseph came to his brothers, they stripped him of his robe—the ornate robe he was wearing—
korean_text: 요셉이 형들에게 이르매 그의 형들이 요셉의 옷 곧 그가 입은 채색옷을 벗기고

sentences.original_text: So when Joseph came to his brothers
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 요셉이 그의 형들에게 왔을 때

sentences.original_text: they stripped him of his robe
the ornate robe he was wearing
